R1.Riddle:
I'm the guardian of the marshes and rivers,
My appearance can be strange and harsh.
I drink stagnant water and hunt on the prowl,
My presence is discreet, but I am robust.
Who am I?

R2.Riddle: What is the full name of the oldest man in this park?

R3.Riddle:
In the animated city, I am a static work,
My perpetual flow makes life more authentic.
I shelter myths and legends in my flow,
In the heart of the city, I am a treasure to be discovered early.
Who am I?
